Articles.Content:
Seeing three space-based pubs, Patnydustries decided to go ONE STEP AHEAD!

.....BY GOING ONE STEP BEHIND!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/tJpx7)

Features: 

Space for 8 Passengers, 8 Relaxing Passengers, 1 Bartender, and 1 Captain.

-A Bar

-A Table

-A Big-ish TV

-Requirement to move to water via Hyperedit

-269 Parts with Food and Drinks, without kerbals

NOTE: May be slightly buggy because of the way KSP works.

Place a Sea Resort in your world today!

DL: [https://www./?stfz5sj5sfrubdm](https://www./?stfz5sj5sfrubdm)

Also, am i the only one who thinks that the new version of the Imgur album should just be restricted to phones?

And i should probably count days till a ground-based pub shows up, be it moving or stationary.
I don't need a sea resort, thanks though. What I really need is a C resort, now when will we get that?

> 
> Same difference. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

If you actually make a C resort I'll be the first download.

I don't think it is possible in Stock,

Besides me not going above 300 parts, there is the problem of "water" and the fact that C resorts have pools, big pools.

As such, this limits me to beaches in KSP, and even then, the pool is so big, that the bit that is supposed to be underwater will be the bit prominently buoyant.

> 
> I don't think it is possible in Stock,
> Besides me not going above 300 parts, there is the problem of "water" and the fact that C resorts have pools, big pools.
> 
> As such, this limits me to beaches in KSP, and even then, the pool is so big, that the bit that is supposed to be underwater will be the bit prominently buoyant.

I meant like an actual C shape.

> 
> I meant like an actual C shape.

Ah, now that you said that, i can imagine a Sea resort boat shaped like a C with the beach chair-beds on one side and the Bar and TV spot on the other side.
